Collection.DataSetId: Level-4 9ka Greenland Ice Sheet Balance Velocity V001
Collection.Description: This data set contains calculated balance velocity of the Greenland Ice Sheet during the last three quarters of the Holocene epoch (9ka).
Collection.ProcessingLevelDescription: Modeled output or geophysical variables derived from multiple measurements

Collection.DataSetId: SMAP L4 Global 3-hourly 9 km EASE-Grid Surface and Root Zone Soil Moisture Geophysical Data V005
Collection.Description: SMAP Level-4 (L4) surface and root zone soil moisture data are provided in three products: * SMAP L4 Global 3-hourly 9 km EASE-Grid Surface and Root Zone Soil Moisture Geophysical Data (SPL4SMGP, DOI: 10.5067/9LNYIYOBNBR5) * SMAP L4 Global 3-hourly 9 km EASE-Grid Surface and Root Zone Soil Moisture Analysis Update (SPL4SMAU, DOI: 10.5067/0D8JT6S27BS9) * SMAP L4 Global 9 km EASE-Grid Surface and Root Zone Soil Moisture Land Model Constants (SPL4SMLM, DOI: 10.5067/5C36BVQZW28K). For each product, SMAP L-band brightness temperature data from descending and ascending half-orbit satellite passes (approximately 6:00 a.m. and 6:00 p.m. local solar time, respectively) are assimilated into a land surface model that is gridded using an Earth-fixed, global cylindrical 9 km Equal-Area Scalable Earth Grid, Version 2.0 (EASE-Grid 2.0) projection.
Collection.ProcessingLevelDescription: Modeled output or geophysical variables derived from multiple measurements

Collection.DataSetId: ATLAS/ICESat-2 L3A Land Ice Height V004
Collection.Description: This data set (ATL06) provides geolocated, land-ice surface heights (above the WGS 84 ellipsoid, ITRF2014 reference frame), plus ancillary parameters that can be used to interpret and assess the quality of the height estimates. The data were acquired by the Advanced Topographic Laser Altimeter System (ATLAS) instrument on board the Ice, Cloud and land Elevation Satellite-2 (ICESat-2) observatory.
Collection.ProcessingLevelDescription: Geophysical variables mapped on a grid

Address.StreetAddress: National Snow and Ice Data Center CIRES, 449 UCB University of Colorado

Collection.DataSetId: ATLAS/ICESat-2 L3A Land and Vegetation Height V004
Collection.Description: This data set (ATL08) contains along-track heights above the WGS84 ellipsoid (ITRF2014 reference frame) for the ground and canopy surfaces. The canopy and ground surfaces are processed in fixed 100 m data segments, which typically contain more than 100 signal photons. The data were acquired by the Advanced Topographic Laser Altimeter System (ATLAS) instrument on board the Ice, Cloud and land Elevation Satellite-2 (ICESat-2) observatory.
Collection.ProcessingLevelDescription: Geophysical variables mapped on a grid

Collection.DataSetId: MODIS/Terra Snow Cover Daily L3 Global 500m SIN Grid V061
Collection.Description: This global Level-3 (L3) data set provides a daily composite of snow cover and albedo derived from the 'MODIS/Terra Snow Cover 5-Min L2 Swath 500m' data set (DOI:10.5067/MODIS/MOD10_L2.061). Each data granule is a 10춿x10춿 tile projected to a 500 m sinusoidal grid.
Collection.ProcessingLevelDescription: Geophysical variables mapped on a grid

Address.StreetAddress: National Snow and Ice Data Center CIRES, 449 UCB University of Colorado
National Snow and Ice Data Center CIRES, 449 UCB University of Colorado

AdditionalAttribute.Name: HORIZONTALTILENUMBER
AdditionalAttribute.Description: Horizontal tile number of a grid which increases from left to right

AdditionalAttribute.Name: PROCESSVERSION
AdditionalAttribute.Description: Version of the process software that generated the product.

AdditionalAttribute.Name: QAPERCENTGOODQUALITY
AdditionalAttribute.Description: Percent of pixels with good quality

AdditionalAttribute.Name: QAPERCENTNOTPRODUCEDCLOUD
AdditionalAttribute.Description: Percent of pixels under cloud

AdditionalAttribute.Name: QAPERCENTNOTPRODUCEDOTHER
AdditionalAttribute.Description: Percent of pixels not produced due to some reason other than cloud

AdditionalAttribute.Name: QAPERCENTOTHERQUALITY
AdditionalAttribute.Description: Percent of pixels with not so good quality

AdditionalAttribute.Name: SNOWCOVERPERCENT
AdditionalAttribute.Description: Percent of granule that was identified as snow covered; % based on area of granule (swath or tile).

AdditionalAttribute.Name: TileID
AdditionalAttribute.Description: MODIS Land tile identification number which represents a geographical area on the surface of the Earth bounded by latitude and longitude coordinates.

AdditionalAttribute.Name: VERTICALTILENUMBER
AdditionalAttribute.Description: Vertical tile number of a grid, which increases from top to bottom.

AdditionalAttribute.Name: identifier_product_doi
AdditionalAttribute.Description: Digital object identifier that uniquely identifies this data product

AdditionalAttribute.Name: identifier_product_doi_authority
AdditionalAttribute.Description: URL of the digital object identifier resolving authority

Collection.DataSetId: MODIS/Terra Snow Cover Daily L3 Global 500m SIN Grid V006
Collection.Description: This data set contains daily, gridded snow cover and albedo derived from radiance data acquired by the Moderate Resolution Imaging Spectroradiometer (MODIS) on board the Terra satellite. Snow cover is identified using the Normalized Difference Snow Index (NDSI) and a series of screens designed to alleviate errors and flag uncertain snow cover detections.
Collection.ProcessingLevelDescription: Geophysical variables mapped on a grid

Collection.DataSetId: MODIS/Terra Snow Cover 8-Day L3 Global 500m SIN Grid V061
Collection.Description: This global Level-3 (L3) data set provides the maximum snow cover extent observed over an eight-day period within 10춿 x 10춿 MODIS sinusoidal grid tiles. Tiles are generated by compositing 500 m observations from the 'MODIS/Terra Snow Cover Daily L3 Global 500m Grid' data set (DOI:10.5067/MODIS/MOD10A1.061). A bit flag index is used to track the eight-day snow/no-snow chronology for each 500 m cell.
Collection.ProcessingLevelDescription: Geophysical variables mapped on a grid

Collection.DataSetId: MODIS/Terra Snow Cover 8-Day L3 Global 500m SIN Grid V006
Collection.Description: This data set reports the maximum snow cover extent during an eight-day period in 1200 km x 1200 km tiles. Tiles are generated by compositing 500 m observations from the MODIS/Terra Snow Cover Daily L3 Global 500m Grid (MOD10A1) data set. Bit flags are also provided that report the eight-day snow/no-snow chronology for each 500 m cell.
Collection.ProcessingLevelDescription: Geophysical variables mapped on a grid
